nodes.text: Qalydon was a planet in the Outer Rim.
Around the time of the Revanite crisis, archaeologists discovered hieroglyphs carved into stone walls at the feet of mountains on Qalydon which depicted the cultural rise of the inhabitants.
The world was connected to the New Sith Wars, which were at times called the "Curse of Qalydon". Its Port Fyrin was headquarters of the Fellowship of Kooroo.
Senator Bail Prestor Organa visited the world when it served as a battlefront during the Clone Wars. After the conflict, it became part of the Galactic Empire.
